MainSection.description: Enterprise-grade platform built with security first. All data hosted exclusively on EU servers with complete GDPR compliance.

FeatureSection.title: Built for Security & Performance
FeatureSection.description: Enterprise features designed with data protection and compliance at the core of every function.

features.title: Precision Targeting
features.description: Advanced targeting capabilities with full data anonymization and privacy controls built-in.

features.title: Growth Analytics
features.description: Real-time insights with encrypted data processing and secure aggregation methods.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Optimized performance without compromising on security or data protection standards.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: Bank-level security with multi-layer encryption, access controls, and audit trails.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Secure team workspaces with granular permissions and activity monitoring.

features.title: Automated Workflows
features.description: Streamline operations with secure automation and encrypted data processing.

ModulesSection.title: Powerful modules for every need
ModulesSection.description: Comprehensive suite of integrated modules designed to streamline your workflow and enhance productivity across your entire organization.

modules.name: Configuration Management
modules.subtitle: Centralized control for all your system settings and preferences.
features: Real-time configuration updates across all environments
Role-based access control with granular permissions

modules.name: E-Commerce Suite
modules.subtitle: Complete solution for managing your online store and transactions.
features: Seamless payment processing with multiple gateways
Inventory management with real-time stock tracking

modules.name: Navigation System
modules.subtitle: Intuitive routing and navigation for complex applications.

modules.name: Analytics Dashboard
modules.subtitle: Comprehensive insights and data visualization platform.
features: Export capabilities for reports and presentations

PricingSection.title: Simple, Secure Pricing
PricingSection.description: Flexible pricing with no hidden fees. All plans include EU hosting and full GDPR compliance.

setup.title: One-Time Setup
setup.description: Professional onboarding with security configuration, data migration assistance, and team training.

ContactSection.title: Ready to Secure Your Data?
ContactSection.description: Join hundreds of European businesses trusting us with their data. Start your free trial today with no credit card required.

brand.name: TrustFlow
brand.description: Enterprise SaaS platform with EU-only hosting, ensuring your data stays secure and compliant.

TrustSection.title: Your Data, Protected in the EU
TrustSection.description: We take data security seriously. All infrastructure is hosted exclusively on EU servers, ensuring your data never leaves European borders and remains fully GDPR compliant.

points.title: No US Cloud Act Exposure
points.description: Your data is protected from foreign jurisdiction requests

points.title: Sovereign Data Storage
points.description: Complete data residency within EU borders at all times

points.title: Redundant Infrastructure
points.description: Multi-region backup across EU data centers for maximum reliability

trustFeatures.title: EU-Only Infrastructure
trustFeatures.description: All data is stored exclusively on servers located within the European Union, ensuring full GDPR compliance.

trustFeatures.title: End-to-End Encryption
trustFeatures.description: Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit using industry-standard AES-256 encryption protocols.

trustFeatures.title: ISO 27001 Certified
trustFeatures.description: Our security management systems meet the highest international standards for information security.

trustFeatures.title: GDPR Compliant
trustFeatures.description: Full compliance with European data protection regulations, giving you complete control over your data.

trustFeatures.title: Regular Security Audits
trustFeatures.description: Independent third-party security audits conducted quarterly to ensure the highest protection standards.
